amendment.description: Amendment sought to eliminate funding for reimbursement to the United Nations for peacekeeping in Liberia and the United States foreign assistance to Liberia and Sudan.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the aggregate amounts made available for International Disaster Assistance and for International Organizations-Contributions for International Peacekeeping Activities to $0.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goode amendment (A009) Failed by voice vote.
